Content:

It is easy to prove something is broken, but very difficult to prove it isn't.

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: what is bad question?

Author: zack#6467
Content: @smk762 -  dracocanis ominator  in Amoveo an oracle can result in 3 alternatives. True or False or BadQuestion.

Author: zack#6467
Content: The smart contracts for betting are programmed so that if the result is bad_question, the bet is undone. each participant gets back out the money they had put in.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: seems most of them are badquestion

Content:
`I can't prove it doesn't work, and no one else has either.`

Author: zack#6467
Content: bad question is in the middle, in a topological sense. it starts there, and then once people can start doing reporting, it usually moves to true or false.

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: here's some orace visualisation from a cluster of chains on the host. Verifiable by anyone with thier own native node - sourced from local

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: http://oracle.earth/ntx_graph/

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: what parameters define `bad question`, or its transition to `true/false`

Author: zack#6467
Content:
there are a bunch of parameters determined by a governance mechanism.
The tool for changing governance values works more or less the same as the oracle tool.

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: is it a participant threshold? or more to it?

Author: zack#6467
Content: true makes the governance value increse, false decreases it, and bad-question it stays the same

Author: zack#6467
Content: a quantity of veo threshold

Author: zack#6467
Content:
you can bet on true/false/bad-question.
bets are always matched at 1:1 price.
So there is only 1 kind of bet in the order book at a time.

Author: zack#6467
Content: the kind of bet in the order book determines how the oracle will result if it closes now.

Author: zack#6467
Content:
there is also a timer that restarts every time the state of the oracle changes.
so if it is in true now, and you make some bets to change it to bad-question, then the timer resets.

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: so it oscilates around true and false on each successive bet?

Author: zack#6467
Content: it is a first come first server order book.

Author: zack#6467
Content: if there are a lot of orders sitting in the book, then it probably wont switch types again.

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: so there is a nominal qty of tickets on either side?

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: where does the shortfall come from at 2:1 odds without a blanced book? variable ticket value?

Author: zack#6467
Content:
Generally for a hard update, first I discuss with the mining pools until we can find a version of the update that we are confident everyone else will approve of.
If it is even slightly controversial, we make a futarchy market to double-check that the community actually wants this update.
